name: Doodle Party (Berkay Demirkol)
description:
I developed the game by myself and my name is Nurettin Berkay Demirkol. For a long time, I couldn't choose between being a cartoonist and a game developer. Now I have found a way to combine these two jobs. This game is the result of that. I made the drawings myself and if the game is liked, I plan to develop different games in the same drawing style.

Thanks for downloading the game

If you haven't downloaded it, thanks for reading
